methods.name: createApplication
methods.desc: Initializes the transaction ID counter when creating the application.

methods.name: subscribe

args.name: account
args.desc: Public key of the account subscribing.

methods.desc: Allows an account to subscribe, setting a subscription period and charging money after the free 1 month period.

methods.name: createRecord

args.name: account
args.desc: Public key of the seller's account.

args.name: asset
args.desc: Asset associated with the seller's record.

methods.desc: Creates a unique seller record based on the account, reference, and asset information.

returns.desc: The unique reference for the seller's record.

methods.name: makePayment

args.name: sellerRef
args.desc: Reference string associated with the seller's record.

methods.desc: Processes a payment transaction, creating a new transaction record and associated metadata.

returns.desc: The receipt (asset) for the payment transaction.

methods.name: claimPayment

args.name: txID
args.desc: Transaction ID of the payment transaction.

methods.desc: Handles the payment claim process, verifying the seller's signature and transferring assets to the seller.

methods.name: getLastSubscription
methods.desc: Retrieves the current subscription period for a given account.

methods.name: getReceipt
methods.desc: Retrieves the receipt (asset) associated with a given transaction ID.

returns.desc: The receipt (asset) for the specified transaction.

methods.name: getVault
methods.desc: Retrieves the vault (asset) associated with a given transaction ID.

returns.desc: The vault (asset) for the specified transaction.

methods.name: getRecordReference
methods.desc: Generates a unique record reference based on start and end timestamps and a reference string.

returns.desc: The unique reference for the seller's record.

methods.name: getMyTxnIDs

args.name: reference
args.desc: Unique reference for the seller's record.

methods.desc: Retrieves transaction IDs associated with a specific record reference.

returns.desc: An array of transaction IDs associated with the specified record reference.

methods.name: getTxnInfo
methods.desc: Retrieves transaction information including description, status, and round index for a given transaction ID.
